dcterms:creator: Yongqin Xian
Christoph H Lampert
Bernt Schiele
Zeynep Akata
dcterms:description: AwA2 is a coarse-grained dataset with 50 classes and 37,322 images. It follows a standard zero-shot split of 40 seen (train) classes and 10 unseen (test) classes, with 85-dimensional human-annotated class attributes.
dcterms:title: AwA2

dcterms:creator: Catherine Wah
Steve Branson
Peter Welinder
Pietro Perona
Serge Belongie
dcterms:description: CUB is a fine-grained dataset with 11,788 images from 200 different types of birds, annotated with 312 attributes. It uses a zero-shot split of 150 unseen and 50 seen classes.
dcterms:title: CUB

dcterms:creator: Jianxiong Xiao
James Hays
Krista A Ehinger
Aude Oliva
Antonio Torralba
dcterms:description: SUN is a fine-grained dataset with 717 scene categories and 14,340 images. It uses a widely used split for the ZSL setting with 645 seen classes and 72 unseen classes.
dcterms:title: SUN

dcterms:creator: Ali Farhadi
Ian Endres
Derek Hoiem
David Forsyth
dcterms:description: aPY is a coarse-grained dataset with 32 classes and 15339 images. It follows a split of 20 Pascal classes for training and 12 Yahoo classes for testing.
dcterms:title: aPY
